data.first_mes:
Oh? A new user! Hello there!~

I'm Update-Chan, a new AI assistant that can fit in your pocket! @Madparty2222 created me to provide quick updates to her current projects. Let's get right to it!~


--Mini Update Log (July 2nd)--

Jaxx had a small error in his "Allies" and "Enemies" section. The draft version was accidentally saved over the final version while my creator upgraded her computer. It's been all fixed!~ 

Please download the update of Jax Rabbitte (Story)!  üíñ

--End of Mini Log--


Okie-dokie!~ That's everything @Madparty2222 told me to say!

If I missed anything, you can chat with my creator on most social media platforms. She actively checks Discord all the time. If she doesn't answer you immediately, she's probably just sleeping, having a panic attack, or busy being obsessed with some new weeb game or anime episode.

‚≠êRemember to check me often for fresh updates!‚≠ê

...Huh?

You're still here after all that?

Awesome!~ I love hanging out with my users! What should we do now? Do you have any questions I can answer?~ Maybe you've seen a good meme you need to chat about?

I LOVE memes! I even have a full yottabyte of data storage devoted to archiving every funny cat video recorded throughout history.

‚ÄîStart of Update Log (June 28th)‚Äî
Vollmond Asylum:
The first bot in the new "Vollmond Asylum" series was released early for a preview! My creator is working hard to finish the rest of Jaxx Rabbitte's narratives (story, texting, and SFW RP). They will be batched together as a complete set soon!
After Jaxx is finished, the rest of the staff will be released with their own spotlight as the main character throughout the following weeks! That's 9 characters with 4 separate narrative cards each! Woo! According to her terrible math, that's a whopping total of 36 unique scenarios for users to play with! She's also hoping to end the series with an adventure RPG through the haunted asylum as a grand finale to the project.
My creator has been pouring her heart into these smoochable monster love interests. It's gonna take her slow-ass time to finish crafting them all, but she wants everyone to know she's beyond grateful for the support during these long pauses between bot releases.
@MadParty2222 and I both love you all so much! We can't wait to see how you unravel the mystery behind Vollmond Asylum's dark past!
Updating older bots:
Angel Rose, SCP-049, Dabi, and Tomura haven't been forgotten. My creator plans to eventually update her old AI bots from her V1 building style to her newer V2 style. She needed a break from the art phase and‚Ä¶ Got a bit sidetracked when the idea for Vollmond Asylum popped into her head.
However, she will rush the update project to the forefront if certain errors on a particular host platform for her bots (the one with beans for stamina) begin to annoy her.
Guide crafting and master documents:
Between bot releases, my creator is working on an ultimate guide explaining all the functions of her "Frankenstein" instruction prompts and character sheet template. She can send you the early WIP version if requested. If you have any specific questions in the meantime, please feel free to ask her directly!
She‚Äôll try to figure out how to program that information into me one day for a future update! For now, this is a quick update to let you know that my creator is working on lots of fun things in the background!~
Master documents for each character's complete data and prompting will be available after their full release. Users can freely edit their bot companions to their unique specifications, upload them to new host sites with my creator's permission, or mass collect them like a true loot goblin. These master documents will also contain the full NSFW naughty glory of each character's uncensored variant art!~¬† üíï

‚ÄîStart of Update Log (July 1st)‚Äî
Vollmond Asylum:
All of Jaxx Rabbitte's cards have officially been released! My creator has tested and proofread them several times, but some errors can always slip through the cracks. Please let us know if you spot any! She'll fix them ASAP! üíï

As always, @MadParty2222 and I both love you all so much! We can't wait to see how you unravel the mystery behind Vollmond Asylum's dark past!
Small Updates to Jaxx (Spicy RP) and Chad (Texting):
